title: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Integrated Mathematics-Science Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Acquisition of integrated instructional design methods applicable to real classroom environments by practicing elementary school teachers

learning_goals: Explain the 5-stage process of integrated mathematics-science instructional design.
Develop an integrated mathematics-science lesson plan reflecting real-life contexts.
Design and demonstrate at least three types of student-centered integrated classroom activities.
Measure the effectiveness of integrated lessons using project-based assessment tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
